name: Hello World Test Workflow
description: Simple test workflow to create a hello world application

tasks.name: Create Hello World Application
tasks.description: Create a simple hello world application in the specified directory
tasks.claudePrompt: Create a hello world application in the directory '${project_dir}'. Tasks: 1) Create the directory if it doesn't exist using 'mkdir -p ${project_dir}', 2) Create a hello.py file with a simple hello world program that prints 'Hello, World!' when run, 3) Create a README.md explaining how to run the program, 4) List the created files to confirm. Use the Bash and Write tools to complete these tasks.
